name: WoW Profile Data
title: WoW Profile Data
description:
Endpoints for World of Warcraft character profiles.

**Hosts**: Note that Blizzard API request paths follow this format: `{region}.api.blizzard.com/{API path}` (or `gateway.battlenet.com.cn/{API path}` for China). For more information, see the [Getting Started guide](/documentation/guides/getting-started).

**Namespaces:** World of Warcraft Game Data APIs require a namespace as part of the request. Each endpoint below lists the correct namespace to use as a parameter. Namespaces can be submitted as headers (**Battlenet-Namespace: {namespace}**) or as query parameters (**?namespace={namespace}**). See [Game Data APIs](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis) for more details.

Character Achievements Summary.description: Returns a summary of the achievements a character has completed.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Appearance Summary.description: Returns a summary of a character's appearance settings.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Equipment Summary.description: Returns a summary of the items equipped by a character.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Media Summary.description: Returns a summary of the media assets available for a character (such as an avatar render).

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Profile Summary.description: Returns a profile summary for a character.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character PvP Bracket Statistics.description: Returns the PvP bracket statistics for a character.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character PvP Summary.description: Returns a PvP summary for a character.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Specializations Summary.description: Returns a summary of a character's specializations.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Statistics Summary.description: Returns a statistics summary for a character.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Character Titles Summary.description: Returns a summary of titles a character has obtained.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Mythic Keystone Character Profile Index.description: Returns the Mythic Keystone profile index for a character.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Mythic Keystone Character Season Details.description:
Returns the Mythic Keystone season details for a character.

Returns a **404 Not Found** for characters that have not yet completed a Mythic Keystone dungeon for the specified season.

{characterName}.description: The lowercase name of the character.

{seasonId}.description: The ID of the Mythic Keystone season.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

category.description: A link to the achievement category for this aggregate.

Achievement Category Aggregate.description: An aggregate of data for achievement categories.

id.description: The numeric ID of the criteria.

amount.description: The amount that has been completed for the criteria.

childCriteria.description: A list of children criteria required to complete this criteria.

completed.description: If true, the criteria is fully completed.

Achievement Criteria Progress.description: Progress toward a World of Warcraft achievement.

Achievement Event.description: A World of Warcraft achievement coupled with point-in-time event information.

id.description: The numeric ID of the achievement.

criteria.description: The criteria required to progress the achievement.

completedTimestamp.description: The time the achievement was completed, if applicable.

Achievement Progress.description: A World of Warcraft achievement coupled with the criteria for its progress.

character.description: The character that the achievements belong to.

guild.description: The guild that the achievements belong to.

totalQuantity.description: The total number of completed achievements.

totalPoints.description: The total number of achievement points.

achievements.description: The list of achievements and their details.

categoryProgress.description: The list of achievement categories and their progress.

recentEvents.description: Recent achievement events that have occurred, sorted descending by timestamp.

Achievement Summary.description: A summary of achievements for a World of Warcraft character or guild.

assets.description: The list of assets pertaining to this media item.

Media.description: A World of Warcraft media item.

key.description: A key to the linked document.

name.description: The localized name of the linked document.

id.description: The ID of the linked document.

slug.description: The slug used to identify and represent the document.

content.description: The inline assets from a media item.

MediaLink.description: A link to a media item.

character.description: A link to the character for this PvP bracket entry.

faction.description: The localized faction of the entry (e.g. ALLIANCE or HORDE).

bracket.description: The type of PvP bracket this entry pertains to.

seasonMatchStatistics.description: The season match statistics for the entry.

weeklyMatchStatistics.description: The weekly match statistics for the entry.

updated.description: The timestamp this document was last updated.

rank.description: The rank of the entry on the associated PvP leaderboard.

tier.description: A link to the tier that this entry's rank has earned them.

season.description: A link to the season this entry participated in.

PvP Bracket.description: Information pertaining to an entry on a PvP leaderboard.

worldMap.description: The PvP map that the statistics pertain to.

playersPerTeam.description: The number of players on a team on this map.

matchStatistics.description: The match statistics for this map.

PvP Map Statistics.description: The statistics for a PvP map for a character.

PvP Match Statistics.description: The statistics for a PvP match.

character.description: A link to the character for this PvP summary.

honorLevel.description: The honor level for the character.

honorableKills.description: The number of honorable kills for the character.

brackets.description: A list of links to PvP bracket entries for the character.

pvpMapStatistics.description: A list of links to map statistics for the character.

PvP Summary.description: A PvP summary profile for a World of Warcraft character.
